title: Awareness App
description: Developed an interactive learning/quiz desktop application using Java Swing assets and collaborated in an Agile team using Git.

title: Health App UI/UX
description: Designed high-fidelity mobile health tracking prototypes and applied UI/UX principles for optimal user flow.

title: Flood Prediction Model
description: Explored the development of a flood prediction model using a Multilayer Perceptron (MLP) trained on historical meteorological and hydrological data.

title: Software Estimation Project
description: Conducted cost/effort estimation using Agile Story Points, UCP, and COCOMO to produce budget and timeline reports.

title: Flood Management System
description: Developed a Python program to automate the allocation of relief resources to flood-affected divisions based on severity and stock.

title: SafeDrive Vehicle System
description: Architected a database for customers, vehicles, and payments while implementing rigorous data integrity checks.

title: SafeDrive Insurance Web
description: Designed and built a car insurance platform using JavaScript, CSS, MySQL, PHP, and HTML to manage user policies.
